segments.text: Look , how grand magnificent the Tiananmen Gate tour is !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is largest pop square in the world.you see that is monument for the people's hero , and the Chairman Mao memorial hall on the south.there is great hall of the people on the west.there are two museums on the east .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the Forbidden city on the north of Gate building .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All the sightseeing in china is very attractive and crescive.travelling to China is very worth one.thank you so much for your guides , and I'll miss you .
segments.speaker: S2
